synopsis.text:
Ookami-san and her eclectic band of friends are no ordinary high school students. As members of the Otogi Bank, a unique club that operates as a problem-solving institution, they are always ready to assist their fellow students with various challenges, from the mundane to the perilous. In exchange, the students must be willing to return the favor in the future.

Led by Liszt Kiriki, the group includes the spunky and manly Ookami Ryouko, who is known for her impressive fighting skills and distinctive canine teeth, and her best friend, the petite and high-pitched Akai Ringo. Other members of the club include the inventive Majolica, the jealous Otohime, the flirtatious Tarou, the serious Alice, and the timid Ryoushi Morino, who suffers from scopophobia, the fear of being looked at. Despite his shyness and fear, Ryoushi joins the club after confessing his love to Ookami, hoping to prove himself worthy of her affection.

As the Otogi Bank members navigate through various challenges and adventures, they strive to bring happiness to their clients while also dealing with their own personal issues, including Ryoushi's unrequited love for Ookami. Will he be able to overcome his fears and win her heart? Join the Otogi Bank on their thrilling and heartwarming journey to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
